description:
The Scientific Python project aims to better coordinate the ecosystem and grow the community. This talk focuses on our efforts to expand our community by generating a welcoming and friendly environment where people collaborate, build, and improve together. Come hear about our recent community building and outreach efforts, and learn how you can get involved!

Connect with us  - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Website:  https://scientific-python.org
Forum: https://discuss.scientific-python.org
Twitter: https://twitter.com/scientific_py
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/ScientificPython-org
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/scientific.python
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/scientific.python
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@scientific.python
title: Scientific Python: From GitHub to TikTok
